argumentText:
ARGUMENT
p

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | polpmap.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | polpmap.o | |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) |
| 3 |  | polpmap.m | |- M = ( pmap ` K ) |
| 4 |  | polpmap.p | |- P = ( _|_P ` K ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Atoms ` K ) = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 6 | 1, 5, 3 | #P_pmapssat | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( M ` X ) C_ ( Atoms ` K ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( lub ` K ) = ( lub ` K ) |
| 8 | 7, 2, 5, 3, 4 | #P_polval2N | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( M ` X ) C_ ( Atoms ` K ) ) -> ( P ` ( M ` X ) ) = ( M ` ( ._|_ ` ( ( lub ` K ) ` ( M ` X ) ) ) ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( P ` ( M ` X ) ) = ( M ` ( ._|_ ` ( ( lub ` K ) ` ( M ` X ) ) ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( le ` K ) = ( le ` K ) |
| 11 | 1, 10, 5, 3 | #P_pmapval | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( M ` X ) = { p e. ( Atoms ` K ) | p ( le ` K ) X } ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( lub ` K ) ` ( M ` X ) ) = ( ( lub ` K ) ` { p e. ( Atoms ` K ) | p ( le ` K ) X } ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_hlomcmat | |- ( K e. HL -> ( K e. OML /\ K e. CLat /\ K e. AtLat ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 10, 7, 5 | #P_atlatmstc | |- ( ( ( K e. OML /\ K e. CLat /\ K e. AtLat ) /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( lub ` K ) ` { p e. ( Atoms ` K ) | p ( le ` K ) X } ) = X ) |
| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( lub ` K ) ` { p e. ( Atoms ` K ) | p ( le ` K ) X } ) = X ) |
| 16 | 12, 15 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( lub ` K ) ` ( M ` X ) ) = X ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( ._|_ ` ( ( lub ` K ) ` ( M ` X ) ) ) = ( ._|_ ` X ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( M ` ( ._|_ ` ( ( lub ` K ) ` ( M ` X ) ) ) ) = ( M ` ( ._|_ ` X ) ) ) |
| 19 | 9, 18 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( P ` ( M ` X ) ) = ( M ` ( ._|_ ` X ) ) ) |
